head.title: TokyoTreat: Japanese Candy & Snacks Subscription Box

meta.content: A Japanese snack subscription box that delivers monthly Japanese candy from Tokyo to your door with free shipping worldwide. Experience Japanese snacks!
meta.name: description

meta.content: TokyoTreat: Japanese Candy & Snacks Subscription Box
A Japanese snack subscription box that delivers monthly Japanese candy from Tokyo to your door with free shipping worldwide. Experience Japanese snacks!
TokyoTreat: Japanese Candy & Snacks Subscription Box
meta.name: twitter:title

meta.content: A Japanese snack subscription box that delivers monthly Japanese candy from Tokyo to your door with free shipping worldwide. Experience Japanese snacks!
meta.name: twitter:description
twitter:image

span.p: LAST DAY to get our December Box! Get it now!

div.h1: Treat Yourself Snack box from Japan!

div.p:
Enjoy a monthly box full of Japanese candy and
snacks! Delivered from Japan to your door.
Choose your plan and hit subscribe!
We handpick fun and unique Japanese snacks!
Tasty Japanese snack and drinks are on their way to you!
Indulge in awesome Japanese snacks! Hit us up at #tokyotreat
Wonder what we have included before in our food subscription? Check out our past snack boxes below and find out!
Awesome Autumn
Hungry Hungry Halloween
Time Travel Treats!
Summer Vacation
Midsummer Munchies
Happy 5th Birthday, Tokyo Treat!
Watch this to check out our latest unboxing video! Your Japanese snack box features authentic Japanese candy from your favorite brands

div.h2: See what our subscribers are saying...

div.p: It took a month and a half to actually get my box, but you get a ton of snacks for what you pay. Will purchase again!
The kids loved every single thing about this box. Can't wait for the next one!
My family and I loved these treats. Can't get enough. I hope to get more of the twisted marshmellowsüëç
Love the variety of sneak foods. Its a little bit pricey, but its worth it
Awesome selection of snacks, love the booklet that explains which snacks are which and great price for the amount given!!
Excellent selection of both savory and sweet treats
I recommend the Premium Box. You can get to know cool and interesting flavors.
Although I've only gotten one box so far (due to the coronavirus) I have enjoyed my experience with TokyoTreat I thought the box had a great balance of sweet/savo...
The moment I received my box and opened it ..I was SHOOK! It definitely is worth the money and the wait. Definitely would recommend!
Should of done this a while ago! Lots of tasty treats thanks for the goods

div.div: Join our global TokyoTreat fam! Get a snack subscription box, snap a selfie, and show off using #TokyoTreat!

div.p: Check out our latest deals and promos.
Sign up to TokyoTreat using code BF2020 to get a Black Friday snack or Starbucks bonus!
Join our newsletter and receive tasty news and deals!
Accepted Payments
